#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned ll

char str[1009];
char res[1009];
ll addBinary(ll num1,ll &carry,ll num2)
{
    ll res = (num1^num2^carry);
    carry = ((num1&carry) | (num2&carry) | (num1&num2));
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll k;
        ll carry=0;
        scanf("%s",str);
        scanf("%lld",&k);
        int n=strlen(str);
        int ind=0;
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            res[ind] = addBinary(k%2,carry,str[i]-'0')+'0';
            ind++;
            k=k/2;
           // cout<<"carry: "<<carry<<endl;
        }

        while(k!=0)
        {
            res[ind] = addBinary(k%2,carry,0)+'0';
            ind++;
            k = k/2;
        }
        if(carry!=0)
        {
            res[ind] = addBinary(0,carry,0)+'0';
            ind++;
        }

        res[ind]='\0';
        reverse(res,res+ind);
        printf("%s\n",res);
    }

    return 0;
}
